text: Yes, I think you're right, lad, and right now the sergeant is in the kitchen, which was always pleasantly snug by then. #IShallWearMidnight

passages.fragment: I think you 're right , lad , and right now
passages.full_quote: "<used>I think you're right, lad, and right now</used> I suggest-" Whatever it was that Stinky was doing, and whatever it was that Stinky actually was, the horses were already becoming skittish to the point of bolting

passages.fragment: , and right now the sergeant is in the kitchen ,
passages.full_quote: "As a matter of fact, yes: the lads made me officer of the Watch so that they could all have a drink, <used>and right now the sergeant is in the kitchen, t</used>hrowing up in the sink"

passages.fragment: in the kitchen , which was always pleasantly snug by then
passages.full_quote: Back in Scoone Avenue, Vimes and Sybil generally took only one meal a day together, <used>in the kitchen, which was always pleasantly snug by then</used>
